contents: Battery-operated LED candles or other low-heat light sources can also be used in luminaria displays. Use caution with luminarias that contain traditional candles. Never place a burning candle near (11) <u>trees or plants that can quickly ignite, curtains, or other hazardous objects</u>. Do not light candles in luminarias during windy conditions, since the bag could catch fire. Monitor candles whenever they are lit, and keep lit candles away from children.
